result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

11:57 AM Defendant MICHAEL T ROSS not in court.  Attorney Lester H Liptak in court for MICHAEL T ROSS.  Attorney Scott Zehr in court for State of Wisconsin. 
ADA Zehr informs the court the defendant has been noncompliant with pretrial monitoring. 
Bench warrant - Body, extraditable
Review hearing on October 11, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:35 AM Defendant MICHAEL T ROSS in court.  Attorney Nicholis J Schroeder in court for MICHAEL T ROSS.  Prosecuting attorney Sara Matthews in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Schroeder on behalf of attorney of record. 
Matters reset. 
Preliminary hearing to be scheduled with the JA. 
Complete booking process. 
Bond continued.
Review hearing scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:56 AM Prosecuting attorney Sheila M. Yohnk in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant MICHAEL T ROSS appeared by video.  Attorney Lester H Liptak in court for MICHAEL T ROSS. 
Defendant unable to attend today's hearing due to health condition. 
Received offer and provided to defendant. 
Court orders defendant to contact Attorney Liptak regarding pending offer. 
Defendant provides updated contact information. 
Court orders defendant to contact pretrial monitoring. 
Bond continued.
Review hearing scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 11:00 am.

records.addlTxt:
2:08 PM Prosecuting attorney Roy La Barton Gay in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant MICHAEL T ROSS in court with Attorney Kirby Harless.
Attorney waives reading of complaint. 
Defendant is informed of charges. 
Defendant received copy of Criminal Complaint. Bond continued.
Review hearing scheduled for May 4, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant is ordered to report to pretrial monitoring immediately after court and must comply'with pretrial
monitoring conditions. 
Defendant shall not possess any dangerous weapons.
Defendant shall not possess any drug paraphemalia/anv syringes unless medically required.
Not to possess or consume any illegal drugs/anv prescription drugs not prescribed.
Not to associate with anyone using or possessing illegal drugs/ drug paraphernalia.

Defendant MICHAEL T ROSS in court with Attorney Nicholis J Schroeder.  Defendant MICHAEL T ROSS in custody.  Sheila M. Yohnk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  MICHAEL T ROSS appeared by video means with Attorney.
